column5: just a few pics from easter weekend  my son and daughter decided to play survivorman after finding these boughs and sticks on shore     my sons laker out of 20ft of water on a unpainted 1\4oz jig and minnow    my son got this nice eye   i told him if he holds it out in front of him it will look bigger   the catch    all in all a great weekend
nice pics. good to see your training him how to catch and hold them.  a lot of nice eyes there.  Matt!
Great to see pics of your kids enjoying the outdoors.    Nice catch too!
Great report and pics rickster  Looks like the kids had a great time out there.... good on ya for taking them out Congratulations to all on the nice mix bag of fish and thanks for sharing Leechman
Great to see the young people out there enjoying what Ontario has to offer, memories that will last a lifetime. Some really nice fish there as well mate, well done on both fronts.
Nice fish there.  I bet the walleye cooked up real nice.
